title: B ig -Math: A Large-Scale, High-Quality Math Dataset for Reinforcement Learning in Language Models
author: Alon Albalak (SynthLabs), Duy Phung (SynthLabs), Nathan Lile (SynthLabs), Rafael Rafailov (Stanford University), Kanishk Gandhi (Stanford University), Louis Castricato (SynthLabs), Anikait Singh (Stanford University), Chase Blagden (SynthLabs), ..., Nick Haber (Stanford University)
relevance_why: The study focuses on constructing a high-quality dataset for reinforcement learning, which could enhance models applicable in audio analysis and generative tasks, relevant to Haohe Liu's research in audio generation.
background: Developing a dataset that includes high-quality, open-ended math problems specifically designed for training reinforcement learning models.
contribution: B ig -Math introduces a comprehensive dataset of over 250,000 math problems that meet rigorous quality standards, achieving improved suitability for reinforcement learning applications.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Existing datasets for math problems are either too small or of variable quality, often compromising on either scale or data integrity.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work combines large-scale dataset construction with stringent filtering processes to ensure high quality and suitability for reinforcement learning.

key_innovation: Utilizes a human-in-the-loop filtering process to maintain quality and introduce new reformulated problems from multiple-choice formats into open-ended challenges.
real_world_impact: Provides a valuable resource for advancing reinforcement learning models, particularly in educational and problem-solving applications, decreasing the gap between data quality and quantity.
limitations: No specific limitations mentioned, but the authors acknowledge that the dataset's complexity may present challenges for less advanced models.

new_terms.reinforcement learning: **Reinforcement Learning (RL)** is a type of machine learning where an agent learns to make decisions by performing actions in an environment to maximize cumulative rewards.

open_sourcing: B ig -Math and B ig -Math -Reformulated are available at https://huggingface.co/datasets/SynthLabsAI/Big-Math-RL-Verified.
